participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and enthusiastic about learning new things.
participant_1.background: I'm tall, even for my family, and I love going to Comic Con. I'm a vegan. I play the guitar. I drive a black car. I was born 20 years ago.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a strong passion for teaching and photography.
participant_2.background: Photography is my passion, but I could never do it if I were blind because it requires a keen sense of sight to capture the perfect shot. I prefer bananas because they are sweet and easy to eat. Teaching is my passion. I have two siblings and we are all vegan. After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows.

content.text: Hi Alex, my name is Sarah.
Nice to meet you Sarah, what are you passionate about?
How long have you been teaching?
I have been teaching for 10 years.
That's awesome. What do you enjoy most about teaching?
I love seeing the light bulb go off in students' heads.
That's a great feeling! What's your favorite subject to teach?
Cool, I love science too. What's your favorite thing about science?
I love learning about new things and exploring the world around us.
That's a great way to look at it. I'm a bit of a nerd, I love learning about new things.
That's not a bad thing at all! Nerds are cool!
Thanks Sarah, you're pretty cool yourself
